reviewText: Caught a couple of the shows on TV and just had to add this to my library.  Too bad more people haven't had the opportunity to explore this show.

Good introduction into plate tectonics and how these geological features are formed. There are five one hour documentaries on 2 DVD's. They include: Tectonic Europe; Along the African Rift; The Pacific Rim, America's; The Western Pacific Rim and The Collison Zone in Asia.
